ygData.msgSnippet: ... Cool, another bertoxx person.  I can make your rogue some poison vials when he needs them, I m a master potter.  You gonna do research? or just buy the
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Message: 3
> Date: Fri, 22 Nov 2002 15:35:26 -0000
> From: "Christopher Corey" <iceburnedd@...>
> Subject: Re: hi evreaone
>
> /sigh ok then!
> bertoxxulous: wizard human 24/rogue halfling 10

>
>

Cool, another bertoxx person. I can make your rogue some poison vials
when he needs them, I'm a master potter. You gonna do research? or just
buy the spells off someone? I'll keep an eye out for wiz research
materials if you want me to.
I'm also a smith so if you want some armor, anything up to chain, I can
make it for you at cost, not quite up to plate yet, but banded is
trivial and I was getting good results from ornate chain.

If you ever want to make money with that halfling, start on tailoring.
Halflings have a cultural tailoring that makes a 100% weight reduction
pack. I'd be willing to give you the materials for one plus at least
100pp if you get your skill high enough to make one.
--
-----------------------------------------
--------------
Bebinn Maolcataig 40 Woodelf Druid, Disciple of Tunare, Dignatio cum
Demori, Bertoxx server

Lindira 23 Vah Shir Bard,Jharin Apprentice, Bertoxx
